description.displayText:
Victoria has been a great caregiver for our family.  She helped out after school with my two boys - 12 and 15 - until we went to virtual learning.  She was always friendly, fun and professional and got along great with everyone.  I really appreciated that she was consistently reliable and timely when arriving and picking my kids up from school and after school activities.  I could depend on her to have delicious meals ready for them, to help my younger one with homework when asked, and to keep in communication with them since the time they needed rides sometimes varied every day depending on variable schedules.  

I found that Victoria always had a great attitude, was flexible and responsive and communicated regularly with me for updates and on how to make our afternoons flow smoothly and to help me have everything in good order so that I could spend quality time with my family when I got home from work.   I definitely recommend her!

description.displayText: I hired Victoria to take care of my 3 year old twin boys, and she has been a pleasure to work with. She is trustworthy, knowledgeable about children, fun and professional. My boys love her and can't wait for her to visit each week. She reads to them, teaches them Spanish, and finds creative ways to entertain them without the use of electronics and screens. She is wonderful, and we are fortunate to have her.

description.displayText: Victoria is fantastic. When we were looking for a babysitter with short notice, she agreed to a late evening interview and showed up the next morning, solving our immediate need. She has been helping us a lot since that. She's dependable, caring and energetic. She keeps him safe, clean and well fed. My son loves her companion because Victoria always finds ways to entertain him through play, songs and books. I would highly recommend hiring her.
